text-node.description: Import rating feed to catalog. This allows product rating summary data to be displayed on category and other pages.
Export catalog to Bazaarvoice. This export contains product data that is displayed on the review landing page, submission form and microsite.
Export purchase data and deliver to Bazaarvoice to use for Post Interaction Emails that generate additional review volume.
Import SmartSEO zipfiles if the feature is turned on.

key-binding.alias: "Error generated while Excecuting SetRequestLocale for inactive locale:"+ DWLocale
dw.system.Logger.error('Error generated while Excecuting SetRequestLocale for inactive locale:'+ DWLocale)
